name: Squirbs
description: Squirbs is a challenging puzzle-platformer in which you control two cute blue Squirbs simultaneously with one set of controls. Looking for an awesomely difficult game? That's Squirbs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core Series CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core Series CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950/AMD R7 250 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Squirbs .... What can I say about this game.....  The main thing about this game is well.... complete each level by collecting the pieces of Crystal it may sound easy but its not. The Game requires you to use your brain or else you will end up DEAD like no joke DEAD because One of your little guy dies so does the other one so think of how you can get both pieces without dying  I will say this game not good in terms of graphics but who am to judge as long you have fun thats the main thing.  and well the music is pretty good I will give that  Overrall I rate this game 7/10 it can be addicting so yeah :D  Would say the price is a little much but if you want an addicting game and rage at times then by all means buy this game
bad character models buts its pretty good

I'm not gonna lie... I didn't mean to break the crystal... This game is actually fun. I have never played a game like this. The idea has been done before but this game seems to do it right. The only problem I see is that the audio makes my speakers sound blown. The game play is smooth and the controls (no game pad support yet) are smooth as well. Levels keep getting harder and harder so if you don't like rage inducing difficult puzzles this game isn't for you. 9/10 would kill my other self again.
I paid 19 cents for this game. What a waste of 19 cents.
Fell into a pit, game crashes 10/10 would squirbs again
